snippet.title: EA Sports, Tiger cut ties on golf video game
snippet.description: EA Sports' popular PGA Tour game will no longer be named for Tiger Woods. The company announced on its blog that it and Woods have made a "mutual decision to end our partnership" and that the company would keep working with the PGA Tour on its next golf

snippet.title: Obama's gift to ESPN's Kornheiser is game of golf
snippet.description: WASHINGTON (AP) President Barack Obama's birthday gift to ESPN commentator Tony Kornheiser is a game of golf. With the president. The White House said Obama teed off Saturday with Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon, co-hosts of the sports network's "Pardon the Interruption" talk show. Saturday was Kornheiser's 65th birthday.

snippet.title: Suddenly, strangely, golf is a perfectly respectable game
snippet.description: Funny how presidential golf is respectable again in the press, writes Mark McKinnon in the Daily Beast . And press conferences? Who notices now? McKinnon points out it’s been nearly a year since President Obama’s held a formal press conference. Compare that to the rate President George

snippet.title: Golf at the (Winter) Games?
snippet.description: Woke up to sunshine for the first time since I got here Tuesday and it felt like a mid-May day in Wisconsin. By the time I got to the UBC Thunderbird Arena at noon (2 p.m. Milwaukee time) to cover Team USA vs. China, the temperature had to be over 50.

snippet.title: Older golfers
snippet.description: Area golfers in their 80s and 90s still living for their regular golf game, many of them shooting their age and even getting better with age. Area golfers in their 80s and 90s still living for their regular golf game, many of them shooting their age and even getting better

snippet.title: Disc golfers enjoy break from winter's chill
snippet.description: A group hitting the 18-hole course at Estabrook Park in Milwaukee for a disc golf game were among people in the area enjoying the warmer temperatures

snippet.title: On Golf | Ramiro Romo's golf game shows plenty of improvement | Father of Dallas Cowboys quarterback shows how to get it done on links

snippet.title: Woods and eagles: Golf booming up north
snippet.description: The steady stream of cars, SUVs and campers heading north on Highway 51 over the Memorial Day weekend was filled with fishermen eager to cast their lot on the hundreds of pristine lakes in Wisconsin's north woods.
